reasoning: ADHD is a chronic neurodevelopmental disorder measured by prevalence, not incidence. Global prevalence ~5.3% (5,300 per 100k) in school-age children based on meta-analyses circa 2005.
source: Polanczyk G et al. (2007). The worldwide prevalence of ADHD: a systematic review and metaregression analysis. Am J Psychiatry. 164(6):942-8
